Abdullah  SALAH EL DIN ALKOUSY

Born in Manfalout city in the middle of Upper Egypt. His linage ends to Al Imam El Hussein Ibn Aly passed by his middle grandfather Yusof Abo Al Hagag Al Auxury (Allah be pleased with them all) 


He completed his study at Alexandria University, and his post graduate in chemistry was at the University of Cairo. And Czechoslovakia . Geology & computer when he studied and worked in Germany, Spain, Turkey, and Saudi Arabia. 



Read old Islamic heritage, affected by Abo Hamid El Ghazaly, Sahrordy AlQushery, abo ElQassim ElKhany, Ibn Taimia and the Two Imams Al Bukhary and Al-Tirmidhi in particular. 

He followed a comprehensive Path that goes back to the third Hejira century where the sincere followers stick firmly to Holy Qor'an Celebration and to the Messenger of Allah Sayings (peace be and prayers upon Him) in his worship and request. 

His method built on Oneness and pure Holiness to Allah The Supreme, out of sincere slavery, and to surrender himself, his direction, and the whole for Alah Lord of the worlds, with pure love for Allah and his Messenger, and whoever related to them, or ask their support. 

The author writing style is the modern scientific method in simplifying meanings and spiritual values. He interpreted the Unseen by sensible scientific logic. All his printed and audible works are free for his followers and for Allah the Supreme. 

From the beginning of the ninetieth he was dedicated to spread the trait of the path to Allah by forums, written works, and spiritual education. A weekly "Hadra" invoking Celebration and preaching at El Hussein and El Sayada Nafisa mosques (may Allah be pleased with them). Besides reviving Birthdays of the Prophet's Family, and Ramadan by the teaching of The Messenger of Allah (peace be and prayer upon Him), and the Prophet Ibrahim (peace be upon him) by offering food, reciting Holy Qur'an, gathering for learning, and glorifying Allah.
